mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) totalNumber, COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(review_money) / 100, 2), 0) totalAmount, COALESCE(SUM(IF(review_state = '-1', 1, 0)), 0) expiredNumber, COALESCE(SUM(IF(review_state = '0', 1, 0)), 0) unReviewNumber, COALESCE(SUM(IF(review_state = '1', 1, 0)), 0) passedNumber, COALESCE(SUM(IF(review_state = '2', 1, 0)), 0) refusedNumber, COALESCE(SUM(IF(review_state = '3', 1, 0)), 0) closedNumber, COALESCE(SUM(IF(review_state = '4', 1, 0)), 0) cancelNumber, COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(IF(review_state = '-1', review_money, 0)) / 100, 2), 0) expiredAmount, COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(IF(review_state = '0', review_money, 0)) / 100, 2), 0) unReviewAmount, COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(IF(review_state = '1', review_money, 0)) / 100, 2), 0) passedAmount, COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(IF(review_state = '2', review_money, 0)) / 100, 2), 0) refusedAmount, COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(IF(review_state = '3', review_money, 0)) / 100, 2), 0) closedAmount, COALESCE(ROUND(SUM(IF(review_state = '4', review_money, 0)) / 100, 2), 0) cancelAmount FROM pc_review WHERE DATE(create_time) = #{date} AND deleted = 0

SELECT SUM(a) userNumber, SUM(b) seniorUser, SUM(c) partnerNumber FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) a, 0 b, 0 c FROM ums_user WHERE deleted = 0 UNION SELECT 0 a, COUNT(1) b, 0 c FROM ums_user WHERE deleted = 0 AND role_id = 1 UNION SELECT 0 a, 0 b, COUNT(1) c FROM ums_partner WHERE deleted = 0 ) t

SELECT order_type, COUNT(1) orderNumber, SUM(pay_amount) orderAmount FROM oms_order
delete_status = 0 AND trans_id > 0
AND DATE(create_time) = #{date}
GROUP BY order_type ORDER BY order_type

SELECT DATE(create_time) day, COUNT(1) count, SUM(pay_amount) money FROM oms_order WHERE delete_status = 0 AND trans_id > 0 AND order_type = 1 AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') = #{date} GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY day

SELECT DATE(create_time) day, SUM(IF(income_type = '2', 1, 0)) count, SUM(expenditure) money FROM ums_income WHERE deleted = 0 AND (income_type = 2 OR income_type = 4) AND DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m') = #{date} GROUP BY DATE(create_time) ORDER BY day

SELECT uu.user_id, uu.nickname, uu.head_portrait, uu.alipay_name, COUNT(1) inviteCount FROM ums_user uu JOIN ums_user_invite uui ON uu.user_id = uui.parent_id GROUP BY uu.user_id ORDER BY inviteCount DESC
